submission:
from typing import *


class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff_cnt = Counter()
        max_diff = []
        for i in range(n // 2):
            diff_cnt[abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i])] += 1
            max_diff.append(max(max(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]), k - min(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i])))
        max_diff.sort()
        ans = n
        idx = 0
        for x, c in sorted(diff_cnt.items()):
            while idx < len(max_diff) and max_diff[idx] < x:
                idx += 1
            ans = min(ans, n // 2 - c + idx)
        return ans
